About Us

Tech Day is an annual celebration of innovation, technology, and the future. Bringing together industry leaders, tech enthusiasts, and curious minds, Tech Day offers an exciting platform to explore the latest advancements in artificial intelligence, virtual reality, cybersecurity, and more. Through hands-on workshops, engaging talks, and interactive demos, attendees get an insider’s look at groundbreaking technologies shaping tomorrow. Whether you’re a student, a professional, or simply passionate about tech, join us to connect, learn, and be inspired. Tech Day is where ideas come alive, opportunities are discovered, and the next generation of innovators unite!

Event Information

What you can get out of Tech Day?

  • Explore the technologies showcased by various companies
  • Discover internships, graduate positions, student jobs, full-time roles, and project opportunities
  • Chat with IT professionals holding the positions you aspire to
  • Enjoy engaging keynotes from industry leaders
  • Attend hyper presentations where 30 companies pitch in 1 minute each, giving you reasons to find them appealing
  • Win exciting prizes
  • And much more

March 5th | 10.00 - 15.00 | DGI Byen

Sign up for Free at www.techday.dk

Graduate Positions Student Jobs 30+ Companies
Project Collabs Internships Keynotes
Full-time Jobs Technologies Prizes

Agenda of the Day

The TechDay is open from 10:00-15:00. Here you can visit the companies booths and attend two keynotes and one hyper presentation throughout the day.
